activities: Infinity Box Inc. offers an online forms tool called Wufoo that allows users to create and administer online forms.  Wufoo collects, stores and processes personal data from users and their form respondents in the EU and EEA to provide those users personalized products and services related to creating and managing online forms.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
